metadata.name: Hope and Strength
metadata.description:
Poetry:

"Keep moving with the internal strength,
Show the motivation that life represents.
Do not lose hope in the end,
Make yourself strong my friend."

Artwork:

The original landscape photograph captured in the Thar Desert in India, digitally rendered with animation and blended with original music.

Resolution: 1600x1200

Date of Creation: 26th February 2022
